website_summaries.verdict: A durable watch that offers good functionality and a combination of classic and elegant styling.
pros: Users praise both the sleek look and practical functionality of this watch, giving it high marks for standing up well over time
Also stands out for its ease of use and helpful Indiglo light-up feature
Versatile look that coordinates well with any outfit
cons: A few minor issues were reported, including ticking noise and fit of the band

customer_reviews.title: I'm a busy college student and this is the perfect watch. It's smaller than I perceived in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a busy college student and this is the perfect watch. It's smaller than I perceived in the picture, however, I'm not disappointed. It matches everything that I wear which makes it the perfect watch for someone not interested in having an extensive selection to decide from in the morning. Also, I can finally tell someone what the date is when they ask with this handy, little watch's date keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Ashmead

customer_reviews.title: Classic, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Loving this watch! The description lists the red watch has having a larger face but I think that is a typo. The face is the same size as a quarter. It is very dainty. I have a small wrist and it fits great -it could even go down 3 more notches! The red is actually more of a burgundy/brown. The watch ticks quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Remember When Timex was Longlasting?
customer_reviews.text: Remember when John Cameron Swayze said that Timex, "Gets a licking and keeps on ticking"? No, most people don't because you are not that old. Well, this Timex lasted one month. Oh, it still keeps time; it still lights up. But, with one wave of my arm, it flew off and the band broke, with the crossbar lost in space. And, when I go to the "Product Support" website of global.timex.com, the message is that "this site cannot be reached." One Month...and there doesn't even seem to be a way to complain to Amazon. Very disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mitchell-Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Beware: "Genuine leather band" BUT SYNTHETIC LINER!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this watch because it said "genuine leather band". What it failed to say is it is lined with a synthetic (plastic?) inside up against your skin. Genuine leather is flexible and does get hot and sweaty like synthetics, hence by lining this band with plastic it negates the benefits of the leather--- just DUMB! I've had a miserable time over the past few months trying to get a decent watch and have ordered and returned several during this "time of Covid" so I'm keeping this one. But if, like me, you wanted that "genuine leather band" note that you won't get it with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne A

customer_reviews.title: was ugly, cheap looking, and too small
customer_reviews.text: I hated this one right out of the box! The strap was horrendous. It was really shiny and looked like plastic. I couldn't see that in the picture on the product page. It was already going back for that reason alone. It makes the whole watch look cheesy cheap. I tried it on anyway and of course the strap was too small for my wrist.... I couldn't fit it into any hole. The gold looks cheap as well. Overall, it kinda looked like some kid's watch you can pick up at the dollar store. I'm a fan of certain Timex styles but I don't care at all for their styles that look dirty cheap. Gotta return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just love this watch!!! I have thinner wrists so I am always worried about how big the watch face will be but this is perfect! The band seems nice and sturdy and it's of great quality. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this watch!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to watch for years. It is easy to read and attractive and just the right size for my wrist. I also love that the dial on this one is slightly off-white. Added bonuses are it keeps great time and is very durable. My husband is into watch collecting and keeps wanting to get me a more expensive, "better than an old Timex" watch, but though I've tried others I keep coming back to this one after only a couple of days. It's just too perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Wear it Well
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this watch as a Christmas gift. It's a good watch; I would recommend it to anyone looking for a women's watch. Timex is a very respectable brand, if that matters to you. As for this watch in particular, it features Timex's signature Indiglo, as well as a date function, on a very simple, very refined, face. Simply put, it looks nice. As for the leather band, it's a simple "genuine leather" band - note that "genuine leather" does not mean high quality. As a strap, it works. It's a little stiff, but still useable, and replacing a mediocre strap is easy. I'd recommend this watch even despite the leather band.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Timex water resistance dependability
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of many Timex watches I have owned over the years. As I wear watches 24/7 the Timex water resistance proves to outlast the fancy prettier ones. Clear readable numbers is important. The indiglo light feature is just plain handy and very missed in the last Timex which was selected for watchband instead of light. Eventually after hundreds of showers (some swimming) condensation builds up under the crystal...still works but more difficult to read. But at $30 I can easily replace. All other parts of Timex watches (band, springs, clasp) are durable as well. I really depend on Timex.
customer_reviews.author: bb22

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin wrists!
customer_reviews.text: Love this classic watch, it's perfect for me as I am very petite and have wrists the same size as an 11 year old. My only issue was I have to tighten it to the very last or next to last notch which left a long strap wrapped almost clean around my wrist. Since this strap is leather I simply trimmed the end, voila! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Good ol' Timex!
customer_reviews.text: I love Timex watches, but my wrist is so small that the "twist-o-flex" bands don't fit me anymore. I've kept my eye on this Easy Reader on Amazon for quite some time, but the price has not gone down, so I bought it recently. Of course, a leather band fits great with all the holes in it. The face is wonderfully clear. I haven't tested waterproof-ness yet. The only thing I've noticed about this band is that it is VERY stiff. Being stuck in an oval shape around my round wrist is not that comfortable. Hopefully, it will mold to my wrist in time... Hence 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: D Dee

customer_reviews.title: Overall great, but...
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself if just what I wanted, but it does have a few things that keep it from being 5-star" 1) There should be a choice in watchband size. I have a 6 3/4" wrist and the band is too large so the excess strap sticks out and catches on things. Since the watch was so cheap I will eventually buy a new band. 2) As others have noted, the date function is pretty impossible tor read unless, perhaps, one has perfect close-up vision. It's pretty useless so "why bother?". If I were the designer for Times, I'd ditch this function or move it from the #3 position and make it large enough to read and thus be usable.
customer_reviews.author: SolvayGirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and simple
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. Pretty but professional with a no-nonsense, easy-to-read face. The picture they have has more shine/bright glare and such but the actual product is more demure (tried to capture that in my photo). If you zoom in, you'll see that it is true that there are "too many" ticks in between the numbers (Why have ten when there are only five seconds between two numbers, one wonders...?) but I forgot about it soon after I first noticed it. Another thing to note is that I can hear the ticking when the watch is within 10 inches of my ear, which I find pleasant, but could probably be irritating to some.
customer_reviews.author: llamaya

customer_reviews.title: Basically a good watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and visability of the watch and it's easy to put on and off. However, even after going on-line to find out how to set the date, I can't get it to set. You have to use the pull out know, but only half way. No matter how I try I can't get it to stop at the right place to change the date. I have limited function in my hands and I just can't do it. That's the only reason it doesn't have 5 stars. But I didn't buy it for that feature, so I don't care. However, anyone hoping to use that feature may have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: helenvan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: I need a analogue watch where I work. I've been using this Timex style watch for about 25 years! Big numbers but small face for my small wrist. Highly adjustable strap. Water resistance stands up to frequent hand washing but I wouldn't wear it in the shower or pool. Once the battery is replaced then it decreases the water resistance and it increases the risk of water leakage and it gets steamy inside. Crystal face stands up to bumps/scrapes very well. Scratches show but it's never cracked. Love the indiglo feature to quickly check the time in the dark. I replace it about each 2-3 years when it's too scratched up or steamy inside.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Johnston (TJ)

customer_reviews.title: Second failure
customer_reviews.text: In December 2019 I bought this watch as an every day watch. Today, when we all have enough to cope with, it quit! That wouldn't be so bad since my daughter bought a Christmas present watch for me, also in December. That one lasted only a month. I buy a lot from Amazon which has always been my go to lookup for products. Not so much anymore. I have given the features I used 5 stars because as long as the watch worked they worked fine. This will probably skew the rating so be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: These are great simple watches for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great simple watches for the price. I am a man but the women's fit my small 7" circumference wrists. The watch lights up in the dark, has large easy to read numbers, looks good enough in brass with the brown faux-leather band for me to wear going out, lasts about two years on the existing battery (depending on how much you use the indiglo light), and readily survives routine dunkings like washing dishes scrubbing garden tools. The date function is too small to read with "retired" eyes but who cares about the date when your retired? This is just a beautiful simple watch.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT scratch proof
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay watch. Not quite sure it's worth the money. But it does the job of telling the time - most of the time. every once in a while the time is slow by a few minutes, and at other times by a few hours. And the date can't seem to keep up so I have to keep fixing it. I'm pretty rough on my hands with my job in tech services and the face of this watch is completely scratched after only 3 weeks of wear. And because I have a small wrist, the face never sits centered on the top of my wrist because of how small I have to make the band.
customer_reviews.author: Kalene

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the small wrist.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Just press the button on the stem for light and no glasses required to read the time in the dark. Most watch bands require links removed by the jeweler, but this leather band works just fine on my small wrist. Timex has a system of installing the battery, but keeping it inoperable until the watch is unpacked and started by the user. So you get a fresh battery in spite of the time on the shelf. Getting it all started couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but just a little loud
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like these. The stainless steel backing is solid and does not make me break out since my skin is sensitive to cheap metals. My only complaint is that these watches are LOUD. When I am reading in a quiet area I can hear the watch ticking away on my wrist. This may not bother some people and may even be a pleasant sound but I did not expect this when purchasing it. The light up function is genius and I like that the date is also shown on the face of the clock. Overall I would buy more of these to add to the two that I already purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch. I am a nurse and use this watch at work. I like the date feature because I sometimes forget what day it is and it is easier to look at my wrist than it is to pull my phone out to check the date. I also like the indigo feature. I sometimes go outside (I work nights). It is not real lit up where I take a break. I like that I can keep track off my break time easier with the indigo feature. I have only had the watch for a week, I hope it last awhile. My last Timex watch battery only lasted for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Galante

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO READ
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this simple Timex watch. I have impaired vision, and the sharp contrast and large numbers is perfect for me. I was surprised when I accidentally hit the built in light. I have had two watches with lights when I was working night shift, but it wasn't a priority for me in this watch. It's been wet several times and dropped a time or two. She just keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: C. Soltis

customer_reviews.title: Just like mama used to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. My style is that late 90's "cosplay as your mom" high waisted jeans and ribbed tanks type style, so I wanted something that looked very similar to a watch my mom always wore when I was growing up. It's actually very pretty. The gold plating isn't bright yellow or gaudy, and the leather band doesn't look cheap or crackly. The watch is keeping time very well and the date stays accurate as well (I saw a lot of people saying the date was always off). I remember my parents buying cheap Timex watched from Walmart when I was a kid and they were always chintzy and never held up. This one is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical Timex
customer_reviews.text: I wear a wrist watch all the time. I replace it with a new Timex when the battery dies rather than pay for a new battery since the watch is low cost. Typically my Timex lasts years on the original battery. I save the old watch's strap as a replacement for any future tearing of a strap. This is the first watch I bought online. It arrived attached around its typical plastic watch case and in good working order. The strap is long which I like. I've had the watch just a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: P Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: it might work, it might not
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice looking watch for the price. if it works. the time was accurate, but as many have reported the date is off. by the 2nd day the date was turning at 9pm. that was almost tolerable. but by the 3rd day it was just stuck. amazon was amazing with the exchange. mailed mine back on sat and got a new one today. already as i try to set the date it seems wonky and i'm getting a bad feeling about this. will give the replacement another day. if it's off it's going back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: lisa94556

customer_reviews.title: Loving this watch, but the band could be better
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works perfectly. Exactly what I needed. When I first got it I thought the leather would fall apart quickly, it looks like there is only a thin layer of leather covering on the band, but it has been holding up great over the past few months of constant use. I havent gone swimming with it but I accidentally left it on when I reached into a tub of water and it still works. The leather band is darker in some areas than it used to be tho. I removed a star because the second strap (the little loop that holds the excess band) is flimsy and is already starting to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect . . .
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine so far. Only drawback is that the wristband is not very pliable. It kind of springs out from my wrist with a mind of its own. I hope that time will cause it to soften and settle down, so I can be sure of which notch on the band is going to be most comfortable. I do love the very readable watch face (numbers readable even with my nearsightedness) and the added benefit of a second hand. Of course I love the fact that it lights up for night time viewing. Often wake up at night a few times, and it is effortless to quickly check what time it is without flicking on a lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Sky

customer_reviews.title: All-around good watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my third watch like this. Inexpensive. Would prefer a stretch band, but didn't want to take the chance it would not fit my bigger woman's wrist. But since this watch has worked so well for me over the years, I stuck with it. The thing I like the best about it is the fact that when I wake up in the middle of the night, I can hit the light button and see the time without having to move around in bed!! Larger, high-contrast numbers help this older gal, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimiwi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Read, Very Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love this Timex watch. Somehow I managed to lose my first one, so this is a replacement. I was very glad that I could still get the same model. It's very reliable and keeps time perfectly. I had my last one for 6 years and it never gained or lost a minute. The other feature I love is that it's easy to read. The numbers are nice and big, and clearly printed. When you add the Indiglo feature, it's easy to read in any light. As long as they continue to manufacture this model, this is the only watch I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this style watch for many years. The band wore out after many years of use and I decided to purchase another watch instead of replacing the band. Love being able to see what time it is in the middle of the night. I have a very small wrist have to cut the end off the leather band and punch one more hole in the band. I've been wearing Timex watches since I was a kid and am now a senior citizen. Takes a licking and keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Timex, as good as it alway was.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from Amazon warehouse deals, at a substantial price savings, listed as an open box. Same as new just the box was messed up. I said this just to let you know don't spend extra $ for new products. The watch is everything That I wanted. Has classic good looks and Timex dependability. It does have a small spot on the bottom of the lit dail when you engage this function. SO WHAT. But it does seem to bother some people. And that's OK, it's their money. But for myself this country girl loves it. Thanks Teressa in W.V.
customer_reviews.author: g adkins

customer_reviews.title: Had to return first one
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order this watch rather than a cheaper one because I thought it would be more dependable. Hah! The first one I received had a loose second hand which fell off as soon as I wore it. I returned it and the new one seems to work fine. I like that the dial will light up if you press the button so you can read it in the dark. I like the size of the numbers. It's nothing fancy but just a basic useful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Vidanueva5

customer_reviews.title: Cost Friendly and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed - cost friendly, easy to read, nice looking, and glows in the dark if you press/hold the knob inward. I have a small wrist so the face is sized perfect (not too small and not too large). To change the date: wind the watch past the # 12 twice (first time for PM; second time for midnight/AM). Quiet -- cannot hear ticking. Taking one star off because I have trouble reading the calendar when it's double digits (numbers are too small).
customer_reviews.author: Living in SJ, CA

customer_reviews.title: This Timex watch is exactly what I was looking for!!!  😁
customer_reviews.text: This timepiece is exactly what I was looking for! I like to wear my watch a bit loose, so It's perfect for me! Love that the time is easy to read, but the size of the date needs to be larger. What's the point of including an amenity that most customers can't see? I asked my niece's opinion, and she agreed. Although I don't use the light on the often, I really like it ! All in all this is a great watch ~ after all it is a Timex!!!😊
customer_reviews.author: BunnyCheeks

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I just started working retail and so am not allowed to keep my cell phone while on the sales floor. I needed a way to keep track of my work and break times, and didn't want to spend too much, so I ordered this watch that was in my price point. It's easy to read and I like that it has the Indiglo feature. It's nothing fancy, but will serve the purpose for which I purchased it and is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Don't love the band on this one
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for 2 months now. Overall I like the watch face, easy to read although the date is tiny (but I'm 44 years old). However, the band on this Timex has already split/cracked on the underneath and isn't comfortable since it's right on my skin. The band wasn't very flexible from the beginning. Haven't had this problem with any other Timex I've owned. Maybe just a bad band on this one?
customer_reviews.author: L. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch for a small wrist
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the brown. It is actually a maroon shiny croco band. Very nice. The band is stiff and round and has to be broken in. The first night I buckled it and laid it flat with some weight on it and that helped reshape it a bit. With daily wear, it conforms to your wrist. It has many holes that accommodate a tiny wrist. Mine is 5" and there are 3 holes left, so this watch will fit. Very attractive looking with the right size dial. The indiglo light comes in handy in bed in the dark to read the time. Best price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joe radosta

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Small, Tasteful, Functional
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a small, simple, tasteful basic woman's watch. My wife loves this watch. My wife has narrow wrists, so the strap (like all women's watch straps) was a little too long, so we purchased a 10mm leather punch in a v-shaped strap end shape and cut off about an inch or .75 of an inch. And we could only do that because this strap is simple without stitching around the edges. The indiglo is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth I. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch for every day wear. It seems to be keeping time just fine and I figured out how to set the date. I have a small wrist so I have to wear it on the next to last hole, so the excess hangs out. I'm not sure I like that. I debated between this one and a stretch band. If I would've known the band was so long wouldn't have ordered it. I would of went with a stretch band but for the price it will work. I like the light feature so you can see the time at night. I gave it four stars because of the long band.
customer_reviews.author: Eskoite323

customer_reviews.title: When the watchband evenually breaks, I just order another of these great watches
customer_reviews.text: Yes, a "Timex goes on ticking" but finding some place that will both sell ou a new watchband AND put it on seems to be as impossible as me, with my arthritis, putting the new band on myself. I give the old one to a resale charity, with the note that it works fine; it just needs a new watch band. These watches are lovely, with an easily readable dial and the ability to illuminate the face to check the time at night. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: O'K

customer_reviews.title: Petite watch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this watch because it was advertised as easy to read. I was hoping to be able to read the numbers without my reading glasses. Unfortunately, I still needed my readers with this watch. The diameter is the size of a quarter but the inner face is slightly smaller. The band is very slim & runs on the smaller size. This watch would be good for someone with very petite wrists or a child. I am 5'1 & weigh 130lbs. I have normal size wrists & this watch still felt too small.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Had the exact same watch for so many years the leather band almost split. The watch needed a new battery as well as a new band. So I decided to spend a little more and purchase a new watch. It is performing as expected. Would have given it five stars but for the fact that the strap that holds the band down when the watch is worn is extremely small, making it difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! some notes on ticking sound and size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and water resistant, as advertised. The only drawback would be that the ticking is quite loud, but it is practically negligible unless you are sensitive to that kind of thing. The face is small as advertised, so be mindful of that when ordering. I was afraid that the strap would be too short given some other reviews, but I found that it fits with room to spare; however it is not much room! And I would not recommend this to someone who has thinner wrists since it does fit snugly. The image attached is for size reference, I do have to adjust it to the second to last hole.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy H.

customer_reviews.title: It's a TIMEX
customer_reviews.text: i NEED A LARGER face and numbers so I can see it quickly while driving; This does the job, The indigo lighting is important because I drive in the dark for an hour each morning and I must see the time. I always buy this watch. After a few years it doesn't keep the time even after a new battery so I just buy a new one. For the price and what it does for me, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Classic, well-made watch
customer_reviews.text: It's a reliable, well-designed watch. Classic design and works like a watch should. Very happy with this watch. I wanted something with clean lines that was easy to read and would run for a long time. I've had this watch for a few months now. Fell asleep with it on sometimes, too, and it's held up great. I'll buy this again in15 years when I need another watch.
customer_reviews.author: R. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Over the past several years, I have bought many Timex watches. I usually purchase them at Walmart or Penneys. The latest one I bought from Amazon. I think the quality is much better. I do know that the watchband is far better. The previous ones had a very small band that just barely fit my wrist and I so not have a large wrist. This one is constructed well and has several holes left for expanding to a larger size if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Robbennolt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality watch, easy to read ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch to replace my old one which, after MANY years, finally stopped working. The watch is easy to read, and I love the Indiglo feature. Although not waterproof, it is water resistant. I love the quality, simple design, and ease of setting the watch. It was also easy to replace the leather strap with my adjustable metal one — simply my preference. For those who like a leather strap, this one was comfortable and looked durable. I love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: dbrussell

customer_reviews.title: Truly Wonderful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more than 5 stars! I love this watch-- it's so tiny and delicate and I've been complimented on it so many times. It has definitely become part of my signature because I wear it everyday. It has a soothing, light ticking noise that it makes, that I personally like. I also like that it has the date in the corner, and I've switched to checking it from using my phone in regards to the date and time. I have a small wrist and I wear it on the second tightest notch. There are 7 notches that could be used for larger wrists, so I would say it could fit most people.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Harper

customer_reviews.title: Strap is too long
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this a 3 is because the strap is way too big. I use the second to last hole and the strap was so long it went almost back to the face and was catching on everything. I finally cut it off and glued it so it wouldn’t fray. I’ve bought these same watches with leather straps and they have not been this long. Now that I’ve solved the problem it’s been good.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, even in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I've used this beautifully simple watch for several months now and am very happy with it. The numbers are easy to read (and with the Indiglo, I can determine the time in the dark when my baby wakes me up in the wee hours of the morning). I found the day of the month feature to be even more useful than I originally anticipated. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Golus

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I've worn this model for years. It's my go to for an everyday day workhorse timepiece. Once upon a time, I taught photography and we used a wet darkroom. I could use the light feature to make sure the students cleaned up and got to their next class on time. I also often wake during sleep and can easily see what time it is. Love this watch !!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M

customer_reviews.title: Classic Timex Indiglo
customer_reviews.text: I can get about 8-10 years out of one of these, but the first time you have to replace the battery, you effectively have lost whatever water resistance was there before the seal was broken. Calendar is too hard to read for my old eyes, and I really didn't want that feature, but Amazon didn't have this classic Timex w/o the calendar, so I must make do. Got it to replace a Timex I had purchased for a Native American watch band I love. Fits just like the old one, just as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Crosby

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Watch for....
customer_reviews.text: I ha e an aunt who had scarlett fever as a child and as such has developmental delays. She specifically asked for a watch for Christmas "like all the other adults have." (Most of the women in our family wear leather bands on our watches.) I knew she would need the durability of a Timex and this watch with the backlight and the large numbers (not Roman Numerals) is perfect for her. She was so excited when she opened the package and she tells me every day how much she loves her watch!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshiny Yellow

customer_reviews.title: Don't take the back off. When the battery dies, you might just have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.text: Leather strap curls out at the end. It always seems to rotate on my wrist to face the most inconvenient way no matter how it's adjusted. I took the battery out to see if it would work in an older watch that I liked more. Unfortunately it didn't, but now the back won't snap back on. I was giving up on it. I actually tried to use a hammer..and a vice just to appease my competitive spirit. Still unsuccessful. It just flops off. It served it's purpose with mediocrity for the 6 months I had it. Now it's in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love Timex Watches .......
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Filled everything I was looking for in a watch. Love the color of the band. It is a reddish brown. If I had to do this all over again, I would buy this watch again in a second !!!!!!!! Before getting this watch I had one just like it for about 10 yrs or more. I wore it out. HA The old one is still working just needs a new band and a battery, but decided to get me a brand new one. Love the dial so easy to read and love the indiglo lighting too.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN H.

customer_reviews.title: Timex Indiglo Women's watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for $30 on November 11 and within three months it stopped so I called the company and they said that the battery will cost me $18 if I send it to them. If I go to jewelry shop, they can change it and will cost less. They told me that this watch must be with Prime for quite sometime and it was on so the battery was gone so soon. I Liked the watch because it was small and looked good but cannot afford to change battery every three months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but band is stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for several weeks now, and it's still keeping time accurately. I like the easy-to-read numbers and the light you can turn on (useful during a movie). The only thing I don't like is that the watch band is rather stiff, so if hard to fasten. Also, it's rather long for my average-sized female wrist, so the end sticks out noticeably. Still, this watch is a very good value for the money. This is the second one that I have had; the previous one lasted about 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: patsf

customer_reviews.title: Band fits my wrist.
customer_reviews.text: I tried on many, many watches in many brands before I purchased this one to replace a Timex I'd had for years whose battery compartment could no longer be opened. The link style bands are too big and often cannot be made smaller whereas the leather band of this watch suits a smaller wrist. The face is easy to read and you can get Indoglo back lighting by pressing on the stem. It is the right size face (about the size of a quarter). I hope to have it for many years as is the case with all of the Timex watches I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: The Fresh Chef

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to read, day or night
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch for the simplicity and durability. I make my own watch bands and have one watch in silver tone and one in gold tone. Traveling with them is great as I can roll over at night, squeeze the button and see the time. The size is right for reading and not so big as to be bulky. Great little watch
customer_reviews.author: California Girl

customer_reviews.title: Qauity watch?
customer_reviews.text: The watch its self is good appearance, keeps time, and wife likes b/c it's easy to read. BUT the back light worked ONE time and hasn't since. Very disappointing right out of the box. Thought of sending back but then another added expense.. Will consider another brand next time. Got some cheap ones at other stores but also failed Changed batteries but didn't work. So much for china junk..
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with damaged night lights.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unsatisfied with this product. As soon as it arrived, I opened the package and tried this on and turned on the night lights to see if it is functioning. It appears that the night light was damaged as you can see in the picture. Going to see if it can returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: The watch came quickly and is very pretty. As many have remarked, the quality of the band is definitely designed to sell the watch at a price point. I suspect I will have to replace it soon. But otherwise I am very happy with it. It lights up amazingly, and it is fascinating how something with a shiny black background can light up to the usual Timex indiglo blue.
customer_reviews.author: WomPayt

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price but.....
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a real cheap Walmart watch I have had for years. The ban broke and was not the type that was replaceable so I just tossed in garbage. It is difficult to pick out a watch without trying on etc. Anyway, this one works great but the band slides and I have to keep pushing back onto my wrist. This is my only problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My go to watch.
customer_reviews.text: My go to watch for years. After having my old Easy Reader die on me after 15 years I purchased this one. I love the timeless style and the indiglo. They are comfortable and light weight. I will say that the leather strap is a bit shorter than my older version, but not short enough to be a huge deal. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: The watch came quickly and is what I expected. The light works well and the strap color is as expected. As some reviewers said, the strap is not of sturdy construction, but is suitable for now. I have not tested the water resistance and hope not to. It is a simple and stylish watch - just what I was looking for. The most important feature was the light for viewing in the dark, which is great when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Spen

customer_reviews.title: Totally dependable
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the same/similar watch I've been wearing for more than 30 years. The leather bands may wear out but the watch never seems to. The only reason I ever replace them is the increasing inability to find replacement batteries and/or people to install them at a reasonable price. Love, love, love the lighted dial when I need it in low light situations. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Night and Day
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of the back light that enables me to check the time at all hours and places. I had a Timex previously and while it was at the jewelers getting a new battery I ordered this one. It is slightly smaller and has a black strap so it is a bit more dressy. The numerals are clear and easy to read. I love it. Mary H Shopper
customer_reviews.author: Mary H shopper

customer_reviews.title: love the style hate the battery replacement
customer_reviews.text: I always loved this style watch for many years. But it must be made in china now because it SUCKS! I replaced batteries so many times I quit wearing the thing. It sits in my drawer. I finally went to the company and brought direct from them and I've had the watch on my wrist for over 2 years and its just now wanting to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller watch than picture?
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice-looking watch but it is a lot smaller than the example on the model arm shows in the picture. There's also a buyer who posted a picture on her arm and it is a lot bigger than the watch I received. The straps are wider and the face is wider on what is advertised. That's why I'm giving it a 3-star because it did not meet my expectation of what was shown. However, for the money it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Business Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this watch the face is easy to read, the band is soft leather, love the "indiglo" feature. The date function is difficult to read, but I think that's my old eyes and not the watch. You have to get operating instructions at Timex.com. I'll check back if I have problems, but right now I'd definitely recommend this Timex, good value.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baltus

customer_reviews.title: Band too short
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, easy to read. Band is too short by at least 1/2 inch. I can buckle it, but it is way too tight. I really can't use the watch until I replace the band with a longer one. The band that comes with it is beautiful but it is 6 3/4 inches, not including the watch face itself which is 7/8 inch. I need at least another 1/2 inch, 3/4 would be better. I am average size, but find that women's jewelry (bracelets, watch bands, etc.) are too small for me. I wish the option of a longer band was given at the time of ordering the watch, as few aftermarket bands are offered, and most are men's styles.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: great durable
customer_reviews.text: I never take off this watch. I swim, do laundry (and get hands wet) shower and bathe children. I also wear in swimming pools, ocean etc. During the night I can always check the time, driving same thing. Any dark place, movie theaters etc. Cannot say enough. Battery and watch last about 3 years, without replacing band. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Love it- good for small wrists
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my previous Timex watch broke without warning. I love that it lights up, but my favorite feature is the multiple holes in the strap. I have very small wrists (I can put my thumb and forefinger around my wrist and have them touch with no effort) and my previous watch got very loose when the leather relaxed over time. With this watch I'm on the second smallest hole instead of the first, so when the leather wears out I can make the watch even tighter. Definitely worth the money- this one was even cheaper than my broken one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Durable Watch
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with my purchase. The watch is as described. The only thing that would make it better is if the band was made of something a bit softer for ease of putting it on. It is just a tad bit stiff. Maybe that will change over time. Works great and really like the flow feature for night time. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: lepoul

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had many of these. Have replaced the bands as they fray or separate but the watch lasts. Have not found any cost efficient way to replace the battery and restore the waterproofing however. It's cheaper to replace the watch if you really need the waterproofing. I wear it kayaking, and cooking and to work. I am in my sixties and the main reason I love this watch is that the white face and the black hands are very sharply contrasting so it is easy to tell the time, even at arms length. Yet it is still small enough to be dressy for work.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Trust a Timex
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch! Great buy on this Timex with date and lighted screen. I swear by Timex! Sixty-four years ago my grandmother gave me my first one for my birthday. I still have it, and it still works. Of course I had to wind that one by hand. The current version is naturally battery operated. And the batteries last a long time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lithander

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Timex Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of this type of Timex watch for many years. Recently, I went without a watch for a year, just relying on my cell phone. Because I miss wearing a watch, I ordered this one and am so pleased with it. It does light up at night. I like the adjustable band, and the size of the watch face. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: measure
customer_reviews.text: Love the indigo night glow feature but should have checked the stated measurements of the watch with a tape measure before ordering it. Face too small for my needs. Plus the band was so stiff that it did not lay flat and arched up on wrist. Might not bother others but not mentioned in website that it is not a soft pliant band.
customer_reviews.author: indiana46

customer_reviews.title: A Readable Classic Timex Old-School Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday watch but it is by no means boring or mundane, unless you think "takes a licking and keeps on ticking" is boring. Everyone else can be bossed around by their smartwatches; I've been wearingTimex since I was old enough to keep track of a watch and read it. I have owned other brands, but always returned to Timex. The Indiglo is absolutely can't live without; the grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna C. Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: Too early to really make a valid comment
customer_reviews.text: So far the product fulfills all expectation, but I have not had it that long and cannot really judge it. Any watch performs immediately. I will need to see the test of time. How long will the battery last. Can it be replaced without damaging the back of the watch. How will the watch and hold up. So really to rate a watch at this point is of no real value. You need to hear from someone who has this watch for at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Crgb

customer_reviews.title: Everyday utility
customer_reviews.text: This is your minimalist, light in weight, good-value wristwatch--with date function. The uncluttered face is a neutral cream in color and hands are black, making it easy to read the time. The date window numbers are small and difficult to read, but that is a function of the overall petite size of the watch. This watch pairs with the T2H281 men's model. Good value here.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I first found the cutest pink plastic watch that caught my I and my fancy. I waited for its delivery and minutes after wearing it discovered that it was not working. Dismayed, I returned to the internet and found the old true and trusty Timex with Indiglow and purchased it. Now, I know the time and don't worry about it's ability to give me the time of day.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna G.

customer_reviews.title: Right On Time
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple of these. I wear them when I go to the movies so I can see what time it is without disturbing anyone. They are good Timex quality; the price is reasonable but they last a long time, even the watchbands. Most of the time it's fairly easy to change the battery. They keep good time. I don't have to reset them other than the spring and fall time changes. So I think they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I give it four stars only because it scatches easily and was slightly smaller than I expected. Other than that, it works really well with no issues. I am very clumsy and tend to switch from indoor activities to outdoors without realizing I still have this watch on. Possibly good for minimal activity such as, outings, office jobs, and such. It does have a louder tick than other watches I've owned. People can hear it tick if they're sitting next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, stylish, and lights up in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a woman's watch. I purchased one that was advertised as a woman's watch a while back, and the front on that watch was so big, it was too heavy, and felt like a man's watch. This is elegant, sits well on my dainty wrist. I will say, can you make the strap shorter? I have a small wrist and have to say, its long (but that's not a con for me). I wear it every single day, even on date night with the hubby. Its comfortable, elegant, stylish, and lights up at night. No regrets, would purchase again, and again.
customer_reviews.author: CemeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Band quality
customer_reviews.text: The second of the loops to hold down the strap on this watch was VERY loose from the get go and now has completely come off. This is my third purchase of this watch (gave the first two to my kids, it's a great watch for those littles just learning to read a clock face BUT the multiple lines rather than 4 is confusing between the numbers). This is the first watch to have issues with the band, the previous two were great and are still holding up great. Super annoying that it's not even two months old and it's broken. I hesitate to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: MomfromLafayette

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this watch it's the same watch I've had before I love the Indiglo and it just pretty much goes with everything. I might order a different band so I can swap it out for more formal events. Just be forewarned make sure you get the right size band I made this mistake once before I purchased a 13 millimeter band and the watch I believe is a 12 millimeter and it's such a minut amount it really frustrated me until I took it back and then realized I had purchased the wrong band. Cannot go wrong with the Timex and as I stated love the Indiglo.
customer_reviews.author: syns10

customer_reviews.title: Wristband is small
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those older types... and perhaps my wrists have expanded over time --- the leather band seems appropriately sized for a child ( -- Do kids even know how to read analog clocks?) The timepiece itself is wonderful - but I think I need to replace the watch's band -- I will always (when I can) buy Timex - they been a reliable time piece for as long as I can remember..
customer_reviews.author: j crowley

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to read in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Timex Moonglow ladies watches for years. This model is much easier to read with slightly larger numerals due to my poor reading vision. The black numbers show up very well against the lighted white background. As a bonus, it has a date calendar in the 3 o’clock position. Great watch for every day use!
customer_reviews.author: Customer2011

customer_reviews.title: A great value and a smart looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Timex watches for about 30 years and each version is better than the last. The numbers are clear and the date is large enough to read (on most other brands this is not the case). This is my favorite and I also have Seiko and Citizen. Besides you can always order a new band if necessary (I've given mine a lot of hard use.)
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bastet

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but has a minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The black insert is off set which you can't see unless you press the indiglo feature. It leaves a small flat line across the bottom just under the six which shows up when you use the indiglo feature.
customer_reviews.author: TicToc

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my mother 1/16/19. Gave it to her this Saturday for her birthday and it stopped keeping time by Sunday. Light still works on watch so know it’s not the battery. Have purchased this watch before for myself in different colors & lasted years. Extremely disappointed!!!! Hoping I can return & replace it without any issues. Forget that...just noticed return date ended 2/21 before my gifting date !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo Kline

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I had a watch like this for at least thirty years. I would periodically replace the battery or watchband as needed, but the watch itself never gave out on me. Wore it all the time for decades except in the shower or swimming. It is professional looking, comfortable, and goes with everything. During coronavirus I could not get to a store to replace the watchband. I went online to look for a watch I would like and ordered it. It arrived today and I realized it was the exact same watch! It's like being reunited with an old friend. This is a great watch and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kaller

customer_reviews.title: This watch arrived with a dead battery.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, it is impossible to write a review on an item that didn't work straight out of the box. It is especially disappointing because it was purchased for someone in quarantine who was not able to get out to have the battery in their watch replaced. Most unfortunate. Even more unfortunate because, due to the quarantine, it will not be possible to retrieve the watch and return it in time or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a 25 year old Timex of the same style. As I recall the price was about the same - but this one has more features [Water Resistance and Built in Light]. The delivery was exactly as promised, so we are most happy with the Product and the Vendor. We recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Glows in the dark watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had Timex Indiglo watches for some time I love how it lights up at night so I can tell what time it is so I can go back to sleep peacefully
customer_reviews.author: Nora Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: The watch was broken when I got it
customer_reviews.text: When I got my watch, it was broken. The stem doesn't turn the date and it will not stay ticking. The box was crushed on one side I don't know if that had anything to do with it. I need to return it but don't know how. I can't find a link on how to return... I just want a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: truthfulone

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch to replace another one just like it. The battery had died and when my husband took the back off to replace the battery, he could not get the back to snap back on. No matter what he did it would not snap on. He ended breaking the crystal trying to snap the back on. Hopefully this new watch will not be the same way. I love the indiglo light and the large numbers as my eyesight is getting bad. I don't use the date thing as it is so small I can't read it even with glasses. I have always found Timex to be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: Work great!!
customer_reviews.text: A fellow was putting a new battery in my old one and cracked the glass cover. This new is exactly like my old one and I love it. Easy to read and I appreciate that I can see it at night with the light feature. I don't use the date, it too small for me to read. I have a phone if I want to know what day it is.
customer_reviews.author: Leona B.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 96 year old mother-in-law with very thin wrist. The strap had enough adjustments to accommodate. Very easy for her to read.
customer_reviews.author: J. Razza

product_meta.title: Timex Women's Indiglo Easy Reader Quartz Analog Leather Strap Watch with Date Feature
product_meta.description:
The direct descendant of our 1960s televised torture test survivors, today's Easy Reader is as durable as it is classically cool.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4 x 3 x 2.5 inches; 0.64 Ounces
 * Item model number :T2H331
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :May 2, 2004
 * Manufacturer :Timex
 * ASIN :B000AYW0M2

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #3,656 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #2011 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #4 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars6,336 ratings The direct descendant of our 1960s televised torture test survivors, today's Easy Reader is as durable as it is classically cool.
feature_bullets: Adjustable black 12 millimeter genuine leather strap fits up to 7.5-inch wrist circumference
White easy-to-read dial with date window at 3 o'clock; Full Arabic numerals
Silver-tone 25 millimeter brass case with mineral glass crystal
Indiglo light-up watch dial. To screw in, push the crown firmly against the threaded protrusion and hold in while turning the crown clockwise
Water resistant to 30 meter (100 feet): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
